sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Button, Column, Tag, Title, List } from "rbx"; import Moment from 'moment'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faShare, faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function ListNotes(props) { const sim = "sim" const nao = "não" return ( {props.notes.length} Notes {props.notes.map((item, key) => props.selectNote(item.id)} active={item == props.current_note}> {item.title.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/ig, "").substring(0,15)} {item.body.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/ig, "").substring(0,30)}

Criada em: {item.created_at}

Atualizada em: {item.updated_at}

Nota compartilhada: {item.compart}

 props.deleteNote(item)} color="grey" />

props.compartNote(item)} color="grey" /> )} ) } export default ListNotes;
